docs.snippet: A Boston mobster living as a rancher under an assumed name in a remote Idaho town has been sentenced to 28 years in prison after being convicted of attempted murder and racketeering charges, prosecutors said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Boston Mobster Posing as Idaho Rancher Gets 28 Years for Attempted Murder
headline.print_headline: Boston Mobster Posing as Idaho Rancher Gets 28 Years for Attempted Murder

docs.lead_paragraph: A Boston mobster living as a rancher under an assumed name in a remote Idaho town has been sentenced to 28 years in prison after being convicted of attempted murder and racketeering charges, prosecutors said on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid said Tuesday that he's received threatening letters at his home, with nearly all of them citing Scripture. He did not say who the letters came from....

headline.main: Sen. Reid Says He's Received Mail Threats at Home
headline.print_headline: Sen. Reid Says He's Received Mail Threats at Home

docs.lead_paragraph: Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid said Tuesday that he's received threatening letters at his home, with nearly all of them citing Scripture. He did not say who the letters came from.

docs.snippet: A private company said it had found what it believes is wreckage of a plane in the Bay of Bengal that should be investigated as potential debris from missing Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, but the possibility was dismissed by search coordinators....

headline.main: Searchers Dismiss Possibility Wreckage in Bay of Bengal Is From MH370
headline.print_headline: Searchers Dismiss Possibility Wreckage in Bay of Bengal Is From MH370

docs.lead_paragraph: A private company said it had found what it believes is wreckage of a plane in the Bay of Bengal that should be investigated as potential debris from missing Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, but the possibility was dismissed by search coordinators.

docs.snippet: The Pakistan Cricket Board will review the life ban for match fixing imposed on the country's former captain Saleem Malik on the recommendation of a judicial inquiry commission, PCB chairman Najam Sethi said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Pakistan Cricket Board to Review Saleem Malik's Life Ban
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Cricket Board to Review Saleem Malik's Life Ban

docs.lead_paragraph: The Pakistan Cricket Board will review the life ban for match fixing imposed on the country's former captain Saleem Malik on the recommendation of a judicial inquiry commission, PCB chairman Najam Sethi said on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: Millions of London commuters struggle to reach work as underground train workers stage their second 48-hour strike this year to protest job cuts, in a dispute expected to cost businesses millions of pounds. Mana Rabiee reports...

headline.main: London commuters battle Tube strike as businesses lament losses
headline.sub: London commuters battle Tube strike as businesses lament losses

docs.snippet: The U.S. Embassy in Venezuela says it will again issue tourist visas for first-time applicants a month after abruptly suspending them....

headline.main: US Resumes Visa Issuance in Venezuela
headline.print_headline: US Resumes Visa Issuance in Venezuela

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Embassy in Venezuela says it will again issue tourist visas for first-time applicants a month after abruptly suspending them.

docs.snippet: The National Basketball Association banned Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling from the game for life and fined him $2.5 million for racist comments, NBA Commissioner Adam Silver announced at a news conference in New York. Rough Cut (no rep...

headline.main: NBA bans Clippers owner from game for life over racist comments
headline.sub: NBA bans Clippers owner from game for life over racist comments

docs.lead_paragraph: The National Basketball Association banned Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling from the game for life and fined him $2.5 million for racist comments, NBA Commissioner Adam Silver announced at a news conference in New York. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

docs.snippet: In any maneuvering around a proxy contest, the $45.6 billion takeover target could have an advantage — as well as time....

headline.main: The Quirk That Bolsters Allergan's Defense

docs.abstract: In any maneuvering around a proxy contest, the $45.6 billion takeover target could have an advantage — as well as time.

docs.snippet: Alliant Techsystems chose to break itself apart through a rarely used corporate maneuver known as the Morris trust, meant to avoid incurring taxes....

headline.main: Alliant Techsystems' Break-Up and the Return of the Morris Trust

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

docs.abstract: Alliant Techsystems chose to break itself apart through a rarely used corporate maneuver known as the Morris trust, meant to avoid incurring taxes.
